Flexible and Efficient Library for Deep Learning

Get Started

Flexible

Supports both imperative programming and symbolic expressions.

Portable

Runs on CPUs or GPUs, on clusters, servers, destkops, or mobile phone

Multiple Lanuages

Supports over 7 programming languages, including C++, Python, R, Scala, Julia, Matlab, Javascripts.

Auto-Differentiation

Only needs to define the model for training.

Distributed Training

Supports various CPU/GPU clusters, including Amazon EC2, Google GCE, Microsoft Azure, and Spark clusters.

Performance

The C++ backend engine optimizes and parallel both I/O and computations
